detail_desc: Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front, a round neck and buttons down the front. Scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and an adjustable hook and loop fastening and fleece inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Regular waist with concealed elastication, a low crotch and straight, wide legs. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Reversible jersey hats with reflective details on one side.

T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front, sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeve-ends and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. UNICEF does not endorse any company, brand or product.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Jacquard-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist and soft terry inside.

Shirt in sturdy cotton twill with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, a flap chest pocket with a hook and loop fastening, a yoke at the back, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem.
V-neck top in soft jersey with a slight sheen. Inset satin panels at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Short top in a ribbed viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.

Jacket in water-repellent, windproof functional fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Diagonal welt side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Patterned pool shoes with a padded foot strap and a moulded sole that is patterned underneath.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a coated Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. The polyester content of the jeans is recycled.

Outdoor trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and press-studs, side pockets, and a back pocket and leg pocket with a zip. Elastication at the back of the waist and gently tapered legs with a stretch jersey inset at the crotch, shaping seams at the knees for optimal mobility and comfort, and reinforced hems with a zip.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Baby Exclusive. Top in soft terry made from an organic cotton blend with buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, text print on the front and dropped shoulders.
Short-sleeved blouse in woven fabric containing some linen with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a tie detail at the hem.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.

Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with an embroidered pattern, wide shoulder straps and scalloped trim at the neckline. Seam with hole-embroidered lace trim at the top, wide smocking at the back and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a rib-knit hem.
Longer T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front, a round neckline and dropped shoulders. Hard-worn details around the neckline, on the sleeves and at the hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, one-shoulder fitted dress in sturdy jersey with two flounces at the top.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Short-sleeved shirt in premium cotton with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.

V-neck blouse in a softly draping weave with a stand-up collar and decorative gathers around the front and back of the neck. Long sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly with buttons and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, low-rise skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Narrow metal hoop earrings with pendants. Diameter 1.2 cm-2.6 cm.
Lightweight sports jacket with a detachable mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and hem and reflective details. Mesh lining.
Ribbed jersey vest top in a narrow cut at the top front and back.
V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey. Smocked, frill-trimmed yoke at the shoulders, flutter sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Suede ankle boots with open toes, a drawstring and covered heels. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and shoulder bag in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with an interactive motif on the front. Bag with a sequined motif and embroidery on the front. Hook and loop fastening at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a hook and loop fastening at one end.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and a lace trim at the neckline.
Baby Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft jersey scrunchies.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Swim cap in printed UV-protective fabric with a peak at the front and flap at the back to protect the back of the neck. UPF 50.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft pointelle knit with scallop-trimmed ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a ribbed hem.
Lined bikini tops with a concealed silicone trim at the top and no shoulder straps.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, kangaroo pocket, ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.

Single-breasted jacket woven in a linen blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Top in cotton jersey with a photographic print on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Cropped jersey T-shirt with an embroidered detail on the front.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with smocking at the top, a seam under the bust and short sleeves.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lace body with a string back. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset.

Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and short legs.
Socks in a soft rib knit with elasticated, frill-trimmed tops.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Button details at the neckline and cuffs.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.

Running jacket in windproof, functional fabric with a hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and concealed front pockets with a zip. Long raglan sleeves with ventilating mesh sections and a partially loose yoke at the back. Reflective details. Unlined.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Top with a soft fleece outer and jersey inside, text print on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Weekend bag in rubber with nylon details. Two handles and a zip at the top, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, one outer compartment and one inner compartment, both with a zip. Studs on the base. Lined. Size approx. 20x26x43 cm.
Super push-up lace bralette with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a shimmering coating and a zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Dress in a patterned cotton weave with a gathered yoke and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, fringed butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Short dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Chest pockets, short sleeves and a narrow tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
